data.comment: The match has started at Urbano Caldeira.
Rafael Monteiro (Atletico Mineiro) sees red and is sent off in Santos!
In the minute 18, Victor is replacing Marrony for Atletico Mineiro at Urbano Caldeira.
Santos take a 1-0 lead thanks to Arthur Gomes.
Jair (Atletico Mineiro) gets booked by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 35, Goal! Alan Franco equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Goal! Santos have got their heads in front thanks to a Marinho strike.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 45, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Santos a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The first-half is over at Urbano Caldeira.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
At Urbano Caldeira, Keno has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's second substitution at Urbano Caldeira with Keno replacing Jefferson Savarino.
In the minute 51, At Urbano Caldeira, Felipe Jonatan for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Free kick Santos.
Marquinhos is on a sub for Jair for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 68, Santos needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos's half?
Cuca (Santos) is making a first substitution, with Wagner Leonardo replacing Alex.
In the minute 75, Santos make their second substitution with Ivonei replacing Carlos Sanchez.
The away team have replaced Allan with Hyoran. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Derick is replacing Madson for the home team.
Throw-in for Santos close to the penalty box.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos's half?
Yeferson Soteldo for Santos is whistled offside.
Goal! Santos extend their lead to 3-1 through Marinho.
